title: Audit current Next.js 14 usage patterns
description:
Document current usage of Next.js features:
- App Router patterns (layouts, pages, loading states)
- Server vs client components
- Data fetching patterns
- Middleware usage
- next.config.js settings
- API routes (if any)

title: Research and plan migration to Next.js 16
description:
Upgrade web app from Next.js 14.2 (React 18) to Next.js 16 (React 19).

Current stack:
- Next.js 14.2.0
- React 18.2.0
- Radix UI components
- TanStack Query v5
- Zustand v4
- Tailwind CSS 3.4

Key migration considerations:
- React 18 → 19 upgrade (new hooks, compiler)
- Turbopack as default bundler
- Server Actions enhancements
- Third-party package compatibility

title: Create Next.js 16 migration plan document
description:
Consolidate research into actionable migration plan:
- Step-by-step upgrade instructions
- Risk assessment
- Rollback strategy
- Testing checklist
